description:
After learning the glowing shot from Ryoga, Ryoma seeks out an even greater challenge to try it out. The sight reminds Ryoga of how Ryoma was in his younger days. "Let`s have a real fight." Ryoma may have lost his memory, but he`s still as competitive as ever, which brings a smile to Ryoga`s face. Meanwhile, at the shuffle matches, Tokugawa goes toe-to-toe with Byodoin, No. 1 of the Genius 10, with an astoundingly fierce attack. For Tokugawa, Byodoin is an old enemy who completely destroyed him on his first day at camp. Now improved With help from Oni and Irie, Tokugawa pressures Byodoin with his desperate attacks...!
Source: crunchyroll
